name: SpaceCleaner
description:
Game made for VIDEO GAMES LAB : Game Jam 2021 with the theme Arcade

Since it the first gameJAM I intended to finish, i keep it reel simple 

Started as an Android game, explaining the weird resolution....

Destroying asteroid make for more point than avoiding them ;p

Ressource use for this game :

https://mattwalkden.itch.io/lunar-battle-pack

https://screamingbrainstudios.itch.io/seamless-space-backgrounds

https://opengameart.org/content/5-chiptunes-action

https://sfbgames.itch.io/chiptone

https://opengameart.org/content/powerup-animated-orb

and Godot Engine
